cn.trinea.android.common.util

Class DownloadManagerPro

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.trinea.android.common.util.DownloadManagerPro

  • public class DownloadManagerPro
extends java.lang.Object
    DownloadManagerPro
      Get download info
    • getStatusById(long) get download status
    • getDownloadBytes(long) get downloaded byte, total byte
    • getBytesAndStatus(long) get downloaded byte, total byte and download status
    • getFileName(long) get download file name
    • getUri(long) get download uri
    • getReason(long) get failed code or paused reason
    • getPausedReason(long) get paused reason
    • getErrorCode(long) get failed error code
      Operate download
    • pauseDownload(long...) pause download. need pauseDownload(long...) method in DownloadManager
    • resumeDownload(long...) resume download. need resumeDownload(long...) method in DownloadManager
      RequestPro
    • DownloadManagerPro.RequestPro.setNotiClass(String) set noti class
    • DownloadManagerPro.RequestPro.setNotiExtras(String) set noti extras
    Author:
    Trinea 2013-5-4

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusById

        public int getStatusById(long downloadId)
        get download status
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:

      • getDownloadBytes

        public int[] getDownloadBytes(long downloadId)
        get downloaded byte, total byte
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:
        a int array with two elements
        • result[0] represents downloaded bytes, This will initially be -1.
        • result[1] represents total bytes, This will initially be -1.

      • getBytesAndStatus

        public int[] getBytesAndStatus(long downloadId)
        get downloaded byte, total byte and download status
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:
        a int array with three elements
        • result[0] represents downloaded bytes, This will initially be -1.
        • result[1] represents total bytes, This will initially be -1.
        • result[2] represents download status, This will initially be 0.

      • pauseDownload

        public int pauseDownload(long... ids)
        pause download
        Parameters:
        ids - the IDs of the downloads to be paused
        Returns:
        the number of downloads actually paused, -1 if exception or method not exist

      • resumeDownload

        public int resumeDownload(long... ids)
        resume download
        Parameters:
        ids - the IDs of the downloads to be resumed
        Returns:
        the number of downloads actually resumed, -1 if exception or method not exist

      • isExistPauseAndResumeMethod

        public static boolean isExistPauseAndResumeMethod()
        whether exist pauseDownload and resumeDownload method in DownloadManager
        Returns:

      • getFileName

        public java.lang.String getFileName(long downloadId)
        get download file name
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:

      • getUri

        public java.lang.String getUri(long downloadId)
        get download uri
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:

      • getReason

        public int getReason(long downloadId)
        get failed code or paused reason
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:
        • if status of downloadId is DownloadManager#STATUS_PAUSED, return getPausedReason(long)
        • if status of downloadId is DownloadManager#STATUS_FAILED, return getErrorCode(long)
        • if status of downloadId is neither DownloadManager#STATUS_PAUSED nor DownloadManager#STATUS_FAILED, return 0

      • getPausedReason

        public int getPausedReason(long downloadId)
        get paused reason
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:
        • if status of downloadId is DownloadManager#STATUS_PAUSED, return one of DownloadManager#PAUSED_WAITING_TO_RETRY
          DownloadManager#PAUSED_WAITING_FOR_NETWORK
          DownloadManager#PAUSED_QUEUED_FOR_WIFI
          DownloadManager#PAUSED_UNKNOWN
        • else return DownloadManager#PAUSED_UNKNOWN

      • getErrorCode

        public int getErrorCode(long downloadId)
        get failed error code
        Parameters:
        downloadId -
        Returns:
        one of DownloadManager#ERROR_*
